title: BONDAGE INTERROGATION: FLOG TORTURE TIE TEASE WHIP . . . REPEAT
description: "Welcome to your Interrogation sounded like the perfect B-Day Gift from Zoey. He always wanted his bondage and tortures to last longer and this place delivered exactly that. He would stay helpless and in pain until he decided to give up his Code Number.Natasha, his bright red haired Russian Mistress's only goal was to make him give up his Code Word and was willing to do what ever that took. His Birthday plan was to last 24 or more hours to enjoy the pleasures and pains of it all . . . 24 hours was just the beginning.As days roll into weeks and the tortures only get more intense . . . he's lost track of time or days or if he'll ever get free? At least he eventually gets company . . . which is not what he expected.Why isn't his Code Number working? How are they going to torture him tomorrow? Will this ever end?"Love Contains Scenes of, but not limited to - Bondage, Extreme Cock & Ball Torture, Prolonged Bondage, BDSM, Blow Job, Distress, Tease & Denial, Sensory Deprivation, imprisonment, Canning, Whipping, Pain, Pleasure, . . . Oh, and Romance ; )
author: Zatanna Dark
